description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.es-la: El viaje hacia la cima marcial es solitario y largo. Ante la adversidad, debes sobrevivir y permanecer inflexible. Solo entonces podrás avanzar y continuar tu viaje para convertirte en el más fuerte. El "Pabellón Cielo Alto" pone a prueba a sus discípulos de las formas más duras para prepararlos para este viaje. Un día, el humilde barrendero Yang Kai logró obtener un libro negro, lo que lo puso en el camino hacia la cima del mundo marcial.
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

altTitles.th: เมนูรักปักใจท่านดยุก

altTitles.zh: 投喂悲剧男二后，他想HE了！

description.en:
"If I die after eating, that’ll be great!" Luana was born an abandoned princess of a kingdom that would soon be occupied. It’s the story where her death was decided anyway, so she ate what she wanted to eat. Her cooking has captured The General of the Conquering Army, the duke who was cursed and can’t taste foods? "There was nothing I wanted in this small kingdom, but now I think I do.” Why are you looking at me when you say that~?!!! The story of Legion, the occupier of the kingdom who lost his sense of taste due to the curse, and Luana, the only person who could make him taste food.

---
“Are you eating in this situation?”

“Of course! I’ll have to keep savoring the taste until I die. Do you want one?”

She was reincarnated in a novel as Luana, the abandoned princess. And her death was already decided. She just wanted to let people know about her cooking talent, but she was misunderstood as a witch because of her cheese jerky!

The General of the conquering army, Duke Legion, who had lost his sense of taste, took her to the Empire for her extraordinary jerkies and to break the curse that had come down from generation to generation.

“It is delicious, isn’t it?”

“Prepare the same for the dinner.”

She was happy to be able to cook and eat as much as delicious food as she wanted… But now, she also wanted to look after Legion.

‘Eat three meals a day, and make sure to make dessert. I’m sure he will be able to gain some weight…!’

–

The Duke took the jerky from the princess. On the surface, it was no different from any beef jerky. But when he took a bite of it, it felt like a new world had opened up. The jerky, made by the princess, felt more tender than the others as he gently crushed it with his teeth. The taste of condensed meat smudged his tongue as he chewed on. It was just as she said. He could feel the savory taste of the spicy meat, and at the end of the day, he wanted to have more. The desire that he had, faded for a while.

“I didn’t really want anything, but now I think I do.”
description.uk: «Ти їси в такій ситуації?» "Звичайно! Я буду насолоджуватися смаком до кінця. Хочеш шматочок?» У романі вона перевтілилася в Луанну, покинуту всіма принцесу. Її трагічна доля була вирішена заздалегідь. Дівчина просто хотіла показати людям свій кулінарний талант, а її, навпаки, охрестили відьмою. І, здавалось би, через що. Через в’ялений сир! Генерал армії-завойовника, герцог Легіон, який втратив почуття смаку, помітив принцесу і взяв до Імперії за її надзвичайні здібності. А може він сподівався, що Луанна зруйнує його прокляття, що повторювалось з покоління в покоління?

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

title.en: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai wo Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?

altTitles.ja: 男嫌いな美人姉妹を名前も告げずに助けたら一体どうなる?

altTitles.en: What Happens When You Save Two Beautiful Sisters Who Hate Men Without Telling Them Your Name?
The Case About Two Sisters Becoming Extremely Obsessed With Me After I Saved Them

altTitles.es-la: El caso de dos hermanas que se obsesionaron conmigo después de que las salvara

description.en:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful classmates who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, who happened to be involved with the two, will receive "special treatment" from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?! "I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama...

"I want to fall in love and conceive his child."

The long-awaited comicalization of the unpredictable rich romantic comedy has started!
description.ja:
男嫌いで有名な同級生の美人姉妹、亜利沙（ありさ）と藍那（あいな）。
ひょんなことから2人に関わることになった隼人（はやと）は、
男嫌いのはずの彼女たちから"特別扱い"を受けることにーー⁉︎
「隼人様に隷属したいの…」
「愛し合って彼の子供を孕みたいーー」
予測不能な濃厚ラブコメ、待望のコミカライズがスタート！
description.es-la: Arisa y Aina son unas hermosas compañeras de clase famosas por su aversión a los hombres. ¿¡Hayato, que se ha liado con ellas, recibirá un "trato especial" por parte de las chicas que se supone que odian a los hombres...?! ""Quiero ser esclava de Hayato-sama..."" Quiero enamorarme y concebir a su hijo"". ¡La tan esperada comicalización de la impredecible y rica comedia romántica ha comenzado!

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

title.en: I'll Raise You Well in This Life, Your Majesty!

altTitles.ko: 이번 생은 제대로 키워 드리겠습니다, 폐하!

altTitles.ko-ro: Ibeon Saeng'eun Jedaero Kiwo Deurigessseubnida, Pyeha!

altTitles.en: In This Life, I Will Raise You Well, Your Majesty!
I'll Atone by Raising You Properly in This Life, Your Majesty!

altTitles.es: En esta vida lo criare gentilmente su majestad

altTitles.vi: Kiếp này, ta sẽ nuôi dạy Bệ Hạ thật tốt!

altTitles.uk: Цього разу я виховуватиму вас як слід, Принце!

altTitles.ja: 皇妃さまの育児論～2度目は失敗いたしません!～

altTitles.zh: 陛下，这一生我会好好培养你！

description.de: Als Ellisa ihre Augen öffnet und in das Gesicht ihres jungen Sohnes Leon sieht, das voller Liebe und Sorge auf sie herabblickt, wird ihr klar, dass sie durch irgendein Wunder eine zweite Chance erhalten hat. In ihrem vergangenen Leben dachte sie, sie könne Leons Sicherheit nur gewährleisten, indem sie ihn zum Kaiser macht. Wenn sie aber gewusst hätte, dass Leon die Krone überhaupt nicht will und er sich das Leben nehmen würde, wenn ihm die Krone, getränkt mit dem Blut seiner Freunde und Feinde, präsentiert wird, dann hätte Ellisa einen anderen Weg gefunden, ihren Sohn zu beschützen. In diesem Leben ist sie fest entschlossen, eine Möglichkeit zu finden, um sowohl Leons Überleben als auch sein Glück zu bewahren... denn dieses Mal wird alles anders.
description.en:
When Ellisa opens her eyes and sees her young son, Leon, staring at her with eyes full of love and concern, she realizes that, by some miracle, she’s been given a second chance. In her past life, she thought making Leon emperor was the only way to ensure his safety. But if she had known Leon had never wanted the crown, or that laying a crown soaked with the blood of his enemies and beloved ones at his feet would mean he would take his own life before her eyes, she would’ve found another way. In this life, Ellisa is determined to find a way that will ensure both Leon’s survival and happiness. This time, things will be different.

---

**Note:** This work was first published in the order Japanese, English, and the Korean version after. Autors of this work is Korean-Japanese duo, but this work is based on a Korean Web Novel.

**Links:**
* [Official Chinese (Simp) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31390)
* [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-fr)
* [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
* [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)
description.fr: Lorsqu’Ellisa se réveille et aperçoit son jeune fils, Leon, l’observer avec des yeux remplis d’amour et de tendresse, elle comprend qu’on lui a miraculeusement accordé une seconde chance. Dans sa vie passée, elle croyait que pousser son fils à devenir empereur était le seul moyen de garantir sa sécurité. Mais si elle avait su que Leon n’avait jamais voulu monter sur le trône ou que déposer à ses pieds une couronne imbibée du sang de ses ennemis et de ses proches signifierait qu’il s’ôterait la vie sous ses yeux, elle aurait trouvé une autre solution. Dans cette vie, Ellisa est déterminée à trouver un moyen qui assurera la survie et le bonheur de Leon. Cette fois, ce sera différent!
description.ja: 自分の欲によって息子のレオンと罪なき皇太子アセンシオを死なせた第2皇妃エリサ。2度めの生では子どもたちが望むままに生きていける世界にすると誓った。子どもたちを守るため、エリサはまず皇太子の信頼を得て彼の後見人になる。騎士団を創設し、水の精霊と契約するなど、他にも積極的に動くエリサに、皇帝カイトまでもが彼女に注目し始めるが…。
description.ko:
"왜 이렇게 돼 버린 걸까? 내가 할 수 있는 모든 걸 다 했는데."

아들 레온을 황제로 만들기 위해 자신의 모든 걸 바친 엘리사.
은염의 마녀라 불리며 잔혹한 짓을 스스럼없이 저질렀다.

그런 피로 가득한 날들이 지나 염원하던 레온이 황제가 되던 날,
레온은 자살을 택한다.
태어나 단 한 번도 행복한 적 없었다며 죽어가는 레온을 보며 절망하던 엘리사.
갑작스러운 폭발 후 눈을 떠보니 과거로 회귀했다.

내 앞에 있는 6살의 레온... 차갑게 식어 가던 체온과 비교하면, 이 온기는 얼마나 사랑스러운가?

"이게 꿈이 아니라면, 나에게 기적처럼 새로운 기회가 주어진 거라면,
널 위한다는 이유로 많은 걸 빼앗겼던 네게 이번만큼은 원하는 걸 모두 이루어주고 싶다."
description.uk:
Вона віддала все, щоб зробити свого сина, третього принца Леона, імператором. У день, коли ця мрія здійснилася, її син отруїв сам себе.
«Я... ніколи в житті не був щасливим».
Для Еліші, яка тримала холодний труп свого сина, залишався лише відчай. «Леон…»
Однак, втративши свідомість, вона прокинулась і виявила, що її маленький син знову мило дивиться на неї!
«Якщо це не сон, якщо це нова можливість… Я зроблю все заради тебе».
Еліша, яка поклялася стати доброю матір’ю в цьому житті, замість того, щоб залишати за собою трупи, претендуючи на імператорський престол, робить інший вибір, об'єднуючись зі своїм пасинком, наслідним принцом.
description.vi:
Nhị Hoàng Hậu Elisa đã dành trọn kiếp trước để đưa con trai Leon lên ngai vàng.

Dùng mọi thủ đoạn tàn nhẫn, hy sinh những người cô yêu quý, quay lưng với đau khổ và oán hận của chính Leon, bởi cô tin ngôi vị Hoàng Đế là cách duy nhất để bảo vệ con trai mình.

Thế nhưng, thứ Leon cần không phải là Hoàng vị. Chỉ đến khi con trai tự sát trên ngai vàng, Elisa mới hiểu được điều ấy. 

Sống lại thêm một lần nữa, đối diện với đôi mắt trẻ thơ đầy lo lắng của Leon, Elisa quyết định sẽ thay đổi số mệnh của họ.

Lần này, nhất định đích đến sẽ là hạnh phúc.

altTitles.ja: ペット

description.en: The story revolves around people who possess the ability to infiltrate human minds and manipulate memories. Their powers have been used in the underworld for covering up accidents, assassinations, and all manner of crimes. But these powers not only destroy others' spirits, but also corrupt the users' own hearts…

altTitles.ja: 御手洗家、炎上する

altTitles.en: The Mitarai's House is on Fire

description.en: The house of the Mitarai family, who operated a hospital, burned down in an unfortunate incident. The wife who caused the fire in an act of carelessness prostrated herself, apologizing in front of the flames. 13 years later, Murata Anzu is hired as a housekeeper for the Mitarai house. The woman who greets her is the second wife, Makiko. Despite her high standards, Anzu manages to secure a contract for work. However, her true goal is to infiltrate the house.
description.vi:
Một biến cố đau thương đã xảy đến với nhà Mitarai, một gia đình với truyền thống điều hành bệnh viện qua nhiều thế hệ, dẫn đến toàn bộ cơ ngơi đều bị nhấn chìm trong biển lửa. Người vợ, người được cho là nguyên nhân dẫn đến vụ cháy do sự bất cẩn của mình, chỉ biết quỳ xuống phủ phục tại chỗ, liên tục hết lời nói xin lỗi chồng và con gái.

Mười ba năm sau vụ hỏa hoạn, Murata Anzu, đã được thuê vào nhà Mitarai với tư cách một người giúp việc. Và người đã đứng ra thuê cô là Makiko, vợ kế của bố ruột mình. Thành công trong việc chứng minh sự hữu dụng trước những yêu cầu hà khắt của Makiko, Anzu đã chính thức ký được hợp đồng, danh chính ngôn thuận bước vào nhà Mitarai. Nhưng mục đích thật sự của cô lại không phải đơn giản chỉ có vậy...

The two constantly quarrel, but one day they cross the line while squabbling and end up sleeping together. Yajima regrets it, but at the same time he cannot get Torikai's pleading expression out of his head. However, because they have been rivals until now, he just can't bring himself to be honest with Torikai.

"Before you get your hopes up, The Character is Absolute Garbage, The Manhua is Pure comedy at best… The plot ehhh not so much"  
  
Term : META Stands for (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming is any strategy, action or method used in a game which transcends a prescribed ruleset, uses external factors to affect the game, or goes beyond the supposed limits or environment set by the game. Another definition refers to the game universe outside of the game itself. *(citation needed)*
description.fr:
Escroquer toute la journée, tous les jours, souvent en s'aventurant seul. Il bluffe pour obtenir le pouvoir ultime dans ce monde de culture ! Le voyageur du monde Xue Que ne bluffe pas toujours, mais il en a besoin.

Terme : META signifie (Most Effective Tactic Available) Metagaming est la stratégie, l'action ou la méthode utilisée dans un jeu qui transcende un ensemble de règles prescrit, utilise des facteurs externes pour affecter le jeu, ou va au-delà des limites supposées ou l'environnement établi par le jeu. Une autre définition fait référence à l'univers du jeu en dehors du jeu lui-même.

description.en:
Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα τους διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market.

Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds.

All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!

altTitles.ja: べるぜバブ

description.en:
Ishiyama High is a school populated entirely by delinquents, where nonstop violence and lawlessness are the norm. However, there is one universally acknowledged rule—don't cross first year student Tatsumi Oga, Ishiyama's most vicious fighter.  
  
One day, Oga is by a riverbed when he encounters a man floating down the river. After being retrieved by Oga, the man splits down the middle to reveal a baby, which crawls onto Oga's back and immediately forms an attachment to him. Though he doesn't know it yet, this baby is named Kaiser de Emperana Beelzebub IV, or "Baby Beel" for short—the son of the Demon Lord!  
  
As if finding the future Lord of the Underworld isn't enough, Oga is also confronted by Hildegard, Beel's demon maid who insists he take responsibility as Beel's guardian. Together they attempt to raise Baby Beel—although surrounded by juvenile delinquents and demonic powers, the two of them may be in for more of a challenge than they can imagine.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Beelzebub** (2013)
description.ru:
Сильный хулиган Ога Тацуми, по прозвищу Лютый Ога, Демон или «Чтоб он сдох!» находит ребенка, который оказывается сыном Короля Демонов! Он избранный воспитать ребенка, пока тот не дорастет до того когда будет способен уничтожить мир, вместе с демоном-нянькой Хильдой. Они точно уморят мир …смехом!  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11858) (anime)

altTitles.ja: 日常

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

altTitles.en: My School Life Pretending To Be a Worthless Person

description.en:
The world discovered the essence of the human soul, Ideia, and found a way to materialize it. The stronger one's Ideia, the more power one has.

In a society where hierarchy is determined by this power, F-Rank Park Jinsung has always been his school's punching bag. In reality, though, he is an S-Rank with extreme bloodlust, which he has been hiding to keep others safe.

With only two years left of high school, will Jinsung be able to hide his killer side and prove rank isn't everything?

---
- [Webtoon Teaser](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RNHjCpXtHpI)
description.ko:
인간 영혼의 본질, 이데아를 깨닫고 실체화시키기에 이른 인간들.

세계는 재래식 무기가 통하지 않는 이데아 위주로 사회를 구성하고,
사회 또한 오직 이데아와 그 전투력을 위해서만 포커스를 맞췄다
F급 영혼에 F급 전투력을 가진 주인공 박진성.

학교는 어설픈 군사제를 도입하고, 이데아 등급을 매기는 단위체계로 멸시 받기를 10년째..
하지만 그의 실체는 S급 이데아 ‘완전한 살의’의 각성자.

사람을 죽이는 살의가 영혼의 의의라는 것에 괴로워하고
스스로를 F급, 폐급인 상태로 봉한 채 살아가게 된다.

살의가 영혼의 의미인 박진성은 끝끝내 살의를 제어하고 영혼에 차이 따윈 없다는 걸 증명할 수 있을까?

---

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

description.en: Losing memories after a confession?! A crossdressing boy and the one he loves are cursed to never fall deep in love, and are forced to repeat their confession over and over. What is the antidote to love? Can there be miracles in true love?

description.en: Haru Koyama was an ordinary student until her moron classmate got them both in a terrible accident. Now Haru has been transported to another world where only men are allowed to be adventurers. Determined to make the most of it, she takes a job in the Blue Cat Nocturne brothel to make a living the only way she knows how. No cheat abilities, no powers, just her quick wits and naughty bits!

description.en:
Masaichi Mazono, an otaku boy, and Toiro Kurumi, the most beautiful girl in school, are childhood friends. Toiro, who was always in Masaichi’s room, was supposed to be like family to him. 

But one day, Toiro, who was constantly getting annoyed by her romantic troubles, asks Masaichi to play the role of her boyfriend. They thought it would be simple to pretend to be a couple because they’d been together for so long, but their ideal childhood friend can’t possibly end up as a false lover…

_“E-eh no, holding hands is embarrassing.”_

A childhood friend who is more than a lover embarks on a more adventurous lover’s life than she could have dreamed!
description.ja: オタク男子・真園正市と、学校一の美少女・来海十色は腐れ縁の幼馴染。ある日、恋愛関係のトラブルに嫌気がさした十色に頼まれ、正市は彼氏役を演じることに。「元々ずっと一緒にいるから、カップルのフリも簡単！」と思っていた二人だが、相性抜群の幼馴染が偽の恋人で終わるはずがなく――!?

description.en: A comic about getting yourself a boyfriend... or multiple boyfriends! Four college students begin a polyamorous relationship and navigate the adventure that is their dating life!
description.pt-br: Uma história em quadrinhos sobre conseguir um namorado… Ou vários namorados! Quatro estudantes universitários iniciam um relacionamento poliamoroso e navegam na aventura que é suas vidas amorosas!

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

altTitles.th: กับดักหัวใจของนายยิ้มหวาน

altTitles.ja: 君の笑顔は罠

description.en: Ex-idol trainee Kiyu has lived his whole life adored by everyone for his good looks. But he dreams of ordinary high school life, so when he puts on glasses to blend in with his peers, he finds that making friends is a lot harder when you don’t have your looks to fall back on. Not to mention he’s also socially awkward, his new seatmate has a permanent scowl on her face, and his fans have tracked him down at his new school.
description.ko:
살기 뿜뿜 살벌한 여자 차백합과 빛나는 외모를 가린 남자 안기유!
운명처럼 짝이 된 둘의 난감 빠방 스쿨 라이프!
description.pt-br: O ex idol estagiário Kiyu viveu toda a sua vida adorado por todos pela sua boa aparência. Mas ele sonha com a vida normal no colégio, por isso quando põe óculos para se misturar com os seus colegas, descobre que fazer amigos é muito mais difícil quando não se tem uma boa aparência. Sem mencionar que ele também é socialmente embaraçoso, a sua nova colega de assento tem uma carranca permanente na cara, e os seus fãs localizaram-no na sua nova escola.

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…

A lonely girl finds solace in her bag full of memories; now it's time for her to break through her shell.

description.en:
The Kaede arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Another day of house-sitting for Azusagawa Kaede. As long as her beloved onii-chan is by her side, she was fine with staying home all day, but a desire to change has started growing in her mind...
Experience the adolescence story, with Kaede as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*
description.pt-br:
O arco Kaede da série "Rascal", obras populares da Dengeki Bunko, serializadas como mangá!

Mais um dia de cuidar da casa para Azusagawa Kaede. Enquanto seu amado irmão mais velho estiver ao seu lado, ela está bem em ficar em casa o dia todo, mas um desejo de mudança começou a crescer em sua mente...
Experimente a história da adolescência, com Kaede como personagem principal, de uma maneira só possível através do mangá.

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.
